name: web-storage-object
description: API providing 2 way binding of JavaScript objects to browser WebStorage

scripts.build: browserify src/index.js --s webStorageObject -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/web-storage-object.js
scripts.build_prod: browserify src/index.js --s webStorageObject -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > dist/web-storage-object.min.js

author: Ante Baric (capJavert)
